testcase.classname: When a GET request containing valid authorization credentials and the customer id data for the desired detailed information is sent to the /api/get-user endpoint, the expected status code returned should be 200, and the message in the response body should confirm: "success".
testcase.name: When a GET request containing valid authorization credentials and the customer id data for the desired detailed information is sent to the /api/get-user endpoint, the expected status code returned should be 200, and the message in the response body should confirm: "success".

failure.message: status code: 404, reason phrase: Not Found

testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to be able to access the details of the coupon with the specified ID number via the API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET request body containing valid authorization information and the coupon ID to access details is sent to the /api/coupon/couponDetails endpoint,
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/coupon/couponDetails" path parameters..............passed * The api user prepares a GET request containing the 25 for which details are to be accessed..passed * The API user sends a GET request and records the response ................passed * The api user validates the 25, "Orderder", "ordered", 2, "2024-04-18", "2024-04-20", 10, 0, 1, 2, 4, 4, 0, 1, "2024-04-10T13:38:06.000000Z", "2024-04-10T14:34:58.000000Z" of the response body ..passed
